deleteCalendar_text:
‚ö†Ô∏è **Warning**
Your calendar '<cal_name>' (<cal_days> days) (<cal_id>) was deleted because the **calendar message was deleted**, **permissions changed**, the **channel got deleted**, the **thread was archived**, or the **bot was removed** from the server. 
     Please create the calendar again in case this was a mistake.
(Used urls: <cal_urls>)
getCalendarEmbed_embed_introText: Here you can find an overview of events taking place
user_signup_title: ‚ñ´Ô∏è     **Thank you for adding Paru ‚ùØ‚ùÆ Calendar to your server '<guild_name>'**     ‚ñ´Ô∏è
user_signup:
‚≠êÔ∏è Paru syncs your online calendar to Discord (e.g. Google Calendar, Twitch, ...)
        ‚≠êÔ∏è Sync 1,2, or more calendars to 1 Paru ‚ùØ‚ùÆ Calendar
        ‚≠êÔ∏è 1 Paru ‚ùØ‚ùÆ Calendar per channel, multiple per server
        ‚≠êÔ∏è Reminders. 2-way Discord sync. Everything customizable. Privacy friendly. And more...


    Calendar updates every <refresh_interval> (more frequent with premium plans <https://www.patreon.com/paru>)


    **HOW TO USE THE BOT** _(All commands start with **/paru**)_

        **1.** Create a calendar with **/paru create** in a channel of your choice
        **2.** Add a calendar .ics/ical url with **/paru link** (For tutorial see https://paru.app/calendar/manual)
        (**3.**) Your timezone is already set for you. If not, set the timezone with **/paru timezone**
        (**4.**) Show the end date, description or the location of a calendar - sync to Discord events - or change other things - with **/paru modify**
        (**5.**) Create channel reminders (optionally mention a role) with **/paru reminder** or individual reminders with the üîî-icon on the calendar
    _(More on <https://paru.app/calendar/manual>)_


    Anything missing? Questions? Bug? Suggestions? just leave a message @ https://discord.gg/wuQ9GkvtxK

    Support the bot & the creator + premium plans on <https://www.patreon.com/paru>
    Thanks & Enjoy! <https://paru.app>
create_cmd_create_name: The title of the calendar (35 letters max)
create_cmd_create_days: Amount of days the calendar should display in advance
create_cmd_create: Create a new calendar in the current channel
create_cmd_link: Links the provided .ical url to the Paru calendar in the current channel
create_cmd_timezone_country: Please type in the English name of the country you are currently in and select the correct timezone.
create_cmd_timezone: Set the timezone of all calendars in the server
create_cmd_refresh: Refreshes the calendar in the current channel
create_cmd_modify_name: Change the title of the calendar (35 letters max)
create_cmd_modify_days: Change the amount of days, the calendar should display in advance
create_cmd_modify_link: Select the link from the dropdown that should be removed (loading may take a few seconds)
create_cmd_modify_icon: ‚≠êÔ∏è Enter a single emoji here that will replace ‚ñ´Ô∏è this one
create_cmd_modify_color: ‚≠êÔ∏è Type in the hex color you want to change the calendar to (Google: 'hex color' for more help)
create_cmd_modify_endtime: Enable/Disable showing the end date of the event
create_cmd_modify_description: Enable/Disable showing the description of the event
create_cmd_modify_location: Enable/Disable showing the location of the event
create_cmd_modify_sync2discord: Enable/Disable syncing events from Paru to the Discord internal event system
create_cmd_modify_sync2paru: Enable/Disable syncing events from the Discord internal event system to Paru
create_cmd_modify: Modify different settings of the Paru Calendar in this channel
create_cmd_reminder_remove_reminder: Click on a role-reminder to remove it
create_cmd_reminder_remove: Shows a list of all current role-reminders. Click on a reminder to remove it
create_cmd_reminder_add_role: Select a role that should be mentioned when an event happens
create_cmd_reminder_add_time: When should roles be reminded that an event starts
create_cmd_reminder_add: ‚≠êÔ∏è Create a new role-reminder for when an event starts
create_cmd_reminder: ‚≠êÔ∏è Create or remove role-reminders for the calendar in this channel
create_cmd_premium: Activate your premium ‚≠êÔ∏è on this server
cmdhandler_refresh_successfull: Calendar successfully refreshed. (If it was not refreshed, you did not add a link yet or there is no calendar)
cmdhandler_refresh_error: There is no calendar in this channel to refresh. Please create a calendar with **/paru create** first
cmdhandler_cmd_invalidError: This command is invalid or will be available soon. Start typing **/paru** to see a list of commands.
cmdhandler_create_freelimitreachedError:
You reached your limit for calendars in this server. To get more, please upgrade to a premium plan on https://www.patreon.com/paru
If you already deleted a calendar in a channel (just delete the calendar message), Paru will recognize that you deleted the calendar on the next refresh or use **/paru refresh** in this channel - afterwards please try again
cmdhandler_create_calendarCreationInProg: ..Please stand by..the calendar will be created in a second..
cmdhandler_create_missingPermissionsErro: The bot does not have the permissions to create a calendar in this channel. Please make sure the bot has the following permissions: `View Channel, Send Messages, Embed Links`
cmdhandler_create_success:
Success! Next, use **/paru link <url>** to add a .ics link to synchronize with the calendar. (No idea how? See: https://paru.app/calendar/manual/)

[NO CALENDAR VISIBLE]
If you only see a bell-button, please make sure the bot has the **embed links** permission in this channel
(Still not showing? Go into the settings of your Discord account and make sure this option is active: **Text & Images** > **'Show embeds and preview website links pasted into chat'**
cmdhandler_link_invalidLinkDiscordError: Calendars uploaded to Discord will not work. Please import your file to your e.g. Google Calendar
cmdhandler_link_invalidLinkError: The link you provided was invalid
cmdhandler_link_success: You have added a new link to the calendar in this channel. The calendar will be updated shortly (requires an active link).
cmdhandler_link_error:
- Please create a calendar first (**/paru create**), or
- This link is already added to the calendar (check with **/paru modify remove-link**), or
- You reached your free limit for links. To upgrade visit https://www.patreon.com/paru
cmdhandler_timezone_invalidSelectionErro: Invalid timezone. Please select a zone from the dropdown list (may take a few seconds to load)
cmdhandler_timezone_success: You have set the timezone to `<tz_str>` for this server. All calendars will be updated shortly.
cmdhandler_genericErrorServer: There is an issue with your server. Please add the bot again to your server with all necessary permissions
cmdhandler_modify_urlError: There is no URL to remove from your calendar or please select a valid entry from the dropdown
cmdhandler_modify_iconError: Please only use emojis or symbols
cmdhandler_modify_colorError: Please enter a valid hex color (with the #; #ff00ff) -> Google 'hex color' for help
cmdhandler_modify_missingPermissionsErro: Please make sure the bot has the **MANAGE_EVENTS** permission. Else it won't work. You can also invite the bot again
cmdhandler_modify_nothingSelectedError: You have to set the value of at least one field
cmdhandler_modify_success: You have successfully changed the configuration for the calendar in this channel.
cmdhandler_modify_noPremiumOrCalendarErr:
- Please create a calendar first (**/paru create**), or
- Your server has no premium level (to change color + the icon). To upgrade visit https://www.patreon.com/paru
cmdhandler_reminder_add_nothingSelectedE: Please select a time from the available options
cmdhandler_reminder_remove_invalidSelect: Please select a valid entry from the dropdown or there is no created role-reminder for this calendar yet
cmdhandler_reminder_invalidCommandError: You have to choose if you want to add/remove a role-reminder **/paru reminder add/remove**
cmdhandler_reminder_noPremiumOrCalendarO:
- There is no calendar in this channel (use **/paru create**), or
- This role-reminder already exists, or
 - No role-reminder has been created yet that can be deleted, or
- You don't have premium on your server. To upgrade visit https://www.patreon.com/paru
cmdhandler_reminder_add_success: You have successfully added a reminder for the calendar in this channel.
cmdhandler_reminder_remove_success: You have successfully removed a reminder for the calendar in this channel.
cmdhandler_premium_text:
Help us cover server costs and support development.

‚û°Ô∏è      **Additional features**      ‚¨ÖÔ∏è

- More calendars per server
- More links per calendar
- Faster refresh time
- Instant role-& user reminders
- Channel-wide reminders
- Adjust color & icon of calendar
- Premium for 2 servers
- More coming soon!

https://paru.app/calendar/plans
cpnhandler_indnotbut_infotext:
Please select when you want to be reminded. The reminder will be sent to you by PM.
_(If you want to remind certain roles, please use the **/paru reminder add** command. The accuracy of the reminder corresponds to the update frequency of the calendar (e.g. ¬±24h; paid plan reminders are on-time))_
cpnhandler_indnotmenu_dmsClosedError: Paru is not allowed to send you a DM. Please allow DM's from Paru Calendar (https://support.discord.com/hc/en-us/articles/217916488-Blocking-Privacy-Settings-)
cpnhandler_indnotmenu_noCalendarError: There is no calendar in this channel
cpnhandler_indnotmenu_successChange: You have successfully changed your reminders for the calendar in this channel.
cpnhandler_indnotmenu_successRemove: You have successfully removed your reminders for the calendar in this channel.
cpnhandler_premiumActivate_successful:
Successfully enabled ‚≠êÔ∏è premium status ‚≠êÔ∏è for this server!
(If you use multiple Paru Bots on one server, enabling once is enough)
cpnhandler_premiumActivate_alreadyActiva:
You activated premium already on the maximum allowed servers for your premium tier (<cur_server_count>/<max_server_count>).
Please deactivate premium on one of your servers or upgrade your plan (https://patreon.com/paru)

Activated servers: <activated_servers>
cpnhandler_premiumActivate_patronNotConn: Please make sure your [Patreon-account is connected with your Discord-account](https://www.patreon.com/settings/apps), you have purchased premium, and try again in a few minutes
cpnhandler_premiumDeactivate_successful: Successfully deactivated premium status for this server
acHandler_modify_removelink_noCalendarEr: - There is no calendar in this channel or no reminder created yet -
acHandler_reminder_removeReminder_noCale: - There is no calendar in this channel -
